description: Details required for Conditions 8 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation), 4 (Materials) and 3 (Landscaping) of planning permission 19/02757/OUT (Construction of two storey, four-bedroom self-contained dwellinghouse on associated land (Outine Application to consider Appearance, Layout and Scale))
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 8 (Sustainability and Energy Conservation) of outline planning permission 19/02757/OUT, the proposal fails to demonstrate that the development will achieve an energy efficiency standard of a minimum of 19% CO2 improvement over Building Regulations requirements Part L 2013 (TER Baseline) . Therefore, failing to ensure satisfactory Sustainability and Energy Conservation  in accordance with Policy 5.3 of the London Plan (2016) and Policy DM1 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.The applicant is advised to resubmit with additional information - the additional information could take the form of a signed declaration from a competent professional confirming the requirements have been met, along with the evidence.

Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 3 (Landscaping) of outline planning permission 19/02757/OUT,the proposals potentially affect some mature trees on the southern boundary on council land in a park area. As such we need a detailed Arb method Statement & Tree Protection Plan to be submitted.
